argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgss.1 | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_issubrg | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. A ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprbi | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( A C_ B /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A C_ B ) |
